title: [JIT] elementwise min/max attempting to create a Scalar from a 3 dim Tensor
body_html:
Operator level tests fail with some error about creating a Scalar from a 3-dim tensor with elementwise max and min. Example failure:

======================================================================
ERROR: test_max_elementwise (__main__.TestAutogradGenerated)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3665, in do_test
    check(name)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3592, in check
    fn, (self_variable,) + args_variable)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3498, in check_against_reference
    outputs_test = func(*nograd_inputs)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3474, in script_fn
    return output_process_fn(CU.the_method(*tensors))
RuntimeError: 
Attempting to create a Scalar from a 3 dim tensor (Scalar at /data/users/zdevito/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen/Scalar.h:27)

:
operation failed in interpreter:

def the_method(i0, i1):
    return i0.max(i1)
           ~~~~~~ <--- HERE

Affected tests:

  • test_max_elementwise
  • test_max_elementwise_broadcast_all
  • test_max_elementwise_broadcast_lhs
  • test_max_elementwise_broadcast_rhs
  • test_max_scalar_elementwise_broadcast_lhs
  • test_min_elementwise
  • test_min_elementwise_broadcast_all
  • test_min_elementwise_broadcast_lhs
  • test_min_elementwise_broadcast_rhs
  • test_min_scalar_elementwise_broadcast_lhs
body_text:
Operator level tests fail with some error about creating a Scalar from a 3-dim tensor with elementwise max and min. Example failure:
======================================================================
ERROR: test_max_elementwise (__main__.TestAutogradGenerated)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3665, in do_test

    fn, (self_variable,) + args_variable)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3498, in check_against_reference
    outputs_test = func(*nograd_inputs)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3474, in script_fn
    return output_process_fn(CU.the_method(*tensors))
RuntimeError:

Affected tests:

test_max_elementwise
test_max_elementwise_broadcast_all
test_max_elementwise_broadcast_lhs

body:
Operator level tests fail with some error about creating a Scalar from a 3-dim tensor with elementwise `max` and `min`. Example failure:

```

    outputs_test = func(*nograd_inputs)

    return output_process_fn(CU.the_method(*tensors))
```
